name: Ariel Ephriam VARSANYI, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Varsanyi v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Ariel Ephriam VARSANYI, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Prohibition is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
929 A.2d 637
Ariel Ephriam VARSANYI, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 73 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2007.
